comments.text:
Created attachment 512441
door hangar sizes

Build identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110214 Firefox/4.0b12pre

steps:
1. load https://pip.verisignlabs.com/seatbelt.do
2. click Download the SeatBelt Extension
3. click allow

actual results:
door hangar appears and resizes a couple of times.

expected results:
door hangar shouldn't resize during download.

suggestion:
the estimate and progress text should be on distinct lines and they should both be constrained with the ability to wrap and grow vertically.

note: the extension isn't actually compatible w/ minefield, so it won't install, that isn't relevant to this bug report.
